discussion.author: nickrobinson251
discussion.text:
Can we rename something that might be more informative to non-experts?

 E.g. `GASModels.jl` would be better, since a google search for `GASModels` turns up relevant results at the top (unlike `GAS`).

Alternative much longer names...
- `GeneralizedAutoregressiveScoreModels.jl`
- `GeneralizedAutoregressiveModels.jl`
- `GeneralizedAutoregressiveScore.jl`
- `ScoreDrivenModels.jl`
- ...

discussion.author: raphaelsaavedra
discussion.text: Hey @nickrobinson251! So, the original name for the package was indeed `ScoreDrivenModels.jl`, but we ended up changing It because score-driven models are a somewhat broader class than just GAS. We were avoiding `GASModels` because `GasModels` already exists (https://github.com/lanl-ansi/GasModels.jl) and we want to avoid confusions. We will discuss and come up with a better alternative.

discussion.author: guilhermebodin
discussion.text: This should be closed, it was replaced by #8844
